mapper.sql: id, user_id, carry_serial, carry_order, carry_type, carry_type_name, is_deleted, carr_money, carr_status, create_time, update_time, creater, updater, remarks
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tds_carry WHERE id=#{id} AND IS_DELETED='0'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tds_carry
user_id , carry_serial , carry_order , carry_type , carry_type_name , carr_money , carr_status , create_time , update_time , creater , updater , remarks , is_deleted ,
#{userId} , #{carrySerial} , #{carryOrder} , #{carryType} , #{carryTypeName} , #{carrMoney} , #{carrStatus} , #{createTime} , #{updateTime} , #{creater} , #{updater} , #{remarks} , '0',
mapper.update: UPDATE tds_carry SET IS_DELETED='1' WHERE id=#{id}
